title: Utilizing Machine Learning and Deep Learning Models for Sarcasm Detection

context.prior_knowledge: Basic natural language processing (NLP) and Python programming experience, along with understanding of fundamental machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Most learners are interested in the interdisciplinary field of social sciences and computer science, with limited practical experience in data analysis

learning_goals: Text preprocessing can be performed on social media datasets, and features required for sarcasm detection can be extracted.
Sarcasm classification models can be implemented using various machine learning/deep learning models, such as logistic regression and BERT.
The optimal sarcasm detection method can be proposed by analyzing model performance metrics (precision, recall, F1-score).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
